1�You open the tome to the ??Moogle's Almanack?? chapter and peruse its weather prognostication pages.
1�Close observation of the sky reveals that the weather in this area today will be ????.
1�Close observation of the sky reveals that the weather in this area today will be ????. There is also the possibility of ????, so caution is in order.
1�Close observation of the sky reveals that the weather in this area today will be ???? with a chance of ????.
1�Close observation of the sky reveals that the weather in this area today will be ???? with occasional ????. There is also a slight chance of ????, so caution is in order.
1�Predicting ahead, tomorrow's weather looks to be ????.
1�Predicting ahead, tomorrow's weather looks to be ????. There is also the possibility of ????, so caution is in order.
1�Predicting ahead, tomorrow's weather looks to be ???? with a chance of ????.
1�Predicting ahead, tomorrow's weather looks to be ???? with occasional ????. There is also a slight chance of ????, so caution is in order.
1�Finally, the forecast for the day after tomorrow calls for ????.
1�Finally, the forecast for the day after tomorrow calls for ????. There is also the possibility of ????, so caution is advised.

1�Open the portal?Yes.No.
1�Open the portal?Yes.No.
1�You feel a mysterious energy emanating from the glowing stone in the center of the portal.
1�Investigate the portal?Yes.No.
1�This portal only allows passage in one direction.
1�Open the portal and return to the lobby?Yes.No.
1�Open the portal and return to the lobby?Yes.No.
1�There is a spatial displacement here...
1�Enter the spatial displacement?Yes.No.
1�There is a spatial displacement here...
1�Enter the spatial displacement?Yes.No.
1�Hey, it's  !
1�Glad to see you guys are okay.You gotta help me! I was trying to chase down that two-faced Orc-kisser, Nag'molada...
1�But there's a gate blocking the way! I can't put a dent in it, even with my best drop-kick.Dammit, if I only had my amulet, I could pop it open faster than you could say ??Bahamut's backside!??
1�If we don't get a move on, old Naggy's gonna get to the Chamber of Eventide before us!
1�I don't know for sure, but it's a device that's supposed to suck the Emptiness right out of a person.
1�Do you remember,  ?The Emptiness within caused the ancients to lose the whisper of the soul.
1�Their inner darkness grew so intense that it completely overshadowed the light.
1�And that's why Nag'molada means to use the Chamber of Eventide--to become wholly Zilart once more.
1�But both Miss Mildaurion and Selh'teus warned us that the device is too unstable.
1�We gotta stop him from making a huge mistake!C'mon, get those legs moving!
1�Nag'molada!
1�What the hell!?Promathia was only supposed to come back if Al'Taieu fell to Vana'diel! Bahamut himself said so!
1�The incarnation?
.?�Phoenix...Phoenix was with you, right?She brought you back to life.
1�Miss Mildaurion came to the same conclusion. When the Emptiness dies with you, it will be born again in another form.
1�That's why you sealed it within you. Like I did with my magicite.
1�So, what the hell are we supposed to do?
1�Selh'teus!Have you finally worked up some enthusiasm for this battle!?
1�Let's go,  .
1�But first...!
1�Hey!Nag'molada!
1�Could this soul-stirring voice belong to the king himself?
1�If so, then why does the gate remain closed?Are the children of Vana'diel not welcome here...?
1�Oh,  .Whatever are we to do?
1�Cardinal Mildaurion gifted us with a ring that has the power to transport a person directly to Tavnazia...
1�But I have no intention of returning until we discover the way to open this gate. Perhaps it may be of some small use to you,  .
1�Prishe!?
1�Extract the Emptiness...?
!�You seem surprised.Well, our last parting of ways did seem somewhat final.
4�The time has come.On to the mothercrystal!
1�It is...telling us...to pass through...this gate...
1�What...is this...Chamber of...Eventide...?
1�As the...Moblins say...??Don't leave...a hole...half...dug...??
1�I can hear it clearly now.The source must be beyond this gate.
1�Our contact with the mothercrystal must have altered our senses in some way.That would explain this ethereal voice...
1�You can't hear it?A voice is calling to us, suffocating in its insistence.
1�But you couldn't expect us to stay at home shivering in our fur when word of this rrreached us!
1�Another obstacle in our path?
1�A portal of this magnificence can only lead to the audience chamber of the Zilartian king.
1�I never thought I would don this armor again.Cardinal Mildaurion is not one to be ignored.
1�Why would she be in the chamber...?
1�Has even the Dawn Maiden come to know the icy grasp of Emptiness?
1�Has the great goddess Altana finally abandoned us to our hopeless destiny?
1�Selh'teus!?
1�Why would she do such a thing!?
1�And you let her commit this act!?
1�Lady Yve'noile is not to blame!She built the Chamber of Eventide in the name of love!She tried to rescue us from our fate!
1�How could this have happened!?Is not Paradise meant to be the realm of the gods, overflowing with the blessed light of the crystals!?
1�Are we not supposed to gain a higher dimension of existence--to attain perfection!?
!?�Take it.Leave me be.
1�I must inter Lady Yve'noile within the Ou'Hpat Obelisk.She cannot return to the crystal from here...
1�Open the gates!The elder prince has returned!
1�Lower the drawbridge!The younger prince is home!
s?�For the graves?
1�Prepare the banquet table!The princess is starved!
1�Not very optimistic, are we!
1�I travel......hear lots...Hear...stories... Can tell...if...
1�Do you want to hear a story?No, thank you.Let's hear one.
1�What story would you like to be told?On second thought, maybe later.Garden of Antiquity.A Fate Decided(pt.1).A Fate Decided(pt.2).Apocalypse Nigh.
1�If the plans of the terrestrial avatars and the Kuluu were to fail, this was the last line of defense.
1�She has attempted to absorb the Emptiness pervading the Chamber of Eventide and destroy it along with her own existence.
1�To prevent the coming of the Keeper of the Apocalypse.Promathia has been reborn.
1�Then allow me to correct the statement. The incarnation of the Twilight God has been resurrected.
1�The Keeper of the Apocalypse is the instrument of Promathia's will.
1�And Promathia's will is the Emptiness. The vessel that was destined to hold that darkness is among us once more.
1�The incarnation sought to fill itself with Emptiness.
1�And that Emptiness was found here--a source of darkness drained from many Kuluu during the perfection of the Chamber of Eventide.
1�A darkness greater than that of the intended keeper was unwittingly focused in this place.
1�This source of Emptiness, if left unchecked, would lead to the resurrection of Promathia. Thus the attempt of Lady Yve'noile to send it into oblivion--along with her own life.
1�You speak the truth.We Kuluu are at the beginning of all of this.
1�That is why I absorbed the Emptiness from the chamber...
1�I sealed it within me, and departed this life.
1�...Yes.However, that act was a dangerous gamble.
1�With the creation of this new world, Bahamut lost his power and I could do nothing but flee the incarnation of the Twilight God.
1�I was trapped here, unable to return to Vana'diel.
1�It was then that Lady Yve'noile released the blinding light of her lifeforce to bind the incarnation within the audience chamber...
1�Exhausted by her efforts, she fell into eternal dream...
1�Although it is sustained by an amplified shard of the mothercrystal, this world is not the perfect Paradise of legend.
1�And neither are you ready to be the perfect Warriors of the Crystal.Both you and this world lack the full blessings of the crystal's light.
1�You must pass through the Gate of the Gods and visit the five towers of the Garden of Ru'Hmet.
1�Those towers are bathed in the light of the mothercrystals. They were built to cleanse the five forms of darkness from a person's soul.
1�If that light illuminates the darkness that lurks in the deepest corners of your being, only then may you stand a chance against the incarnation of Promathia.
1�I do not know.I no longer experience any emotion...
1�I realize this may be an unwelcome fact, but you must be prepared. The five forms of darkness are but wispy shadows in comparison to the abyssal void of the Emptiness.
1�It is a complete and implacable foe.
1�Your victory in this battle is not assured.
1�What I can do, though, is show you the truth.Everything will be revealed on the highest level of the palace.
1�If you are still ready to fight when the time comes, I will join you in the struggle to save the world.
1�Come, the path beyond the Gate of the Gods awaits.
1�Ah, hell!Don't think this means I've forgotten anything!All your betrayals, the Moblin massacre--I'll be waiting to make you pay!
1�Wow, the whole gang's here.All because of my selfish mistake...
1�My apologies...6And my thanks!
1�You have registered a new home point!You are now able to teleport here from any other home point.
1�A home point can be set as a spot for you to return to Vana'diel when you have been knocked out. You can also use a home point to teleport to other home point
s.�What will you do?Travel to another home point.Set this as your home point.Other settings.On second thought, never mind.
1�You may change the method of selecting the area of your desired home point to teleport t
